properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaaku paadudi paatan ati shresta Kaaryamulu chesina vaadani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Siyonu vaasulaaraa Ishrayelu devudu ati Ghanundai nee madhya vasiyinchu chunnadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa mana neeti rujuvu chesenani siyonulo Kriyalanu vivarinchedamu randi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shoonya pattanamulu nindinandu valana Yehovaa Neneyani vaaru grahinchedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yerushalem pandugalo gorrela mandala vale Nimpeda manujulatho vaari pattanamulanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mandira samruddiche thrupti pondedaru Nee yaananda nadilo dappi theerchukonduru{/lang-eng}
